title: Natural Language Query Engine
description: Build a search bar: 'Ask a question about IPL cricket...' User provides Anthropic API key once (stored encrypted in localStorage). Sends schema context + user question to Claude API client-side to generate SQL. Runs generated SQL in DuckDB-WASM. Displays results in a styled widget. Andy Flower insight panel: sends query results back to Claude with Andy Flower persona prompt to generate cricket context and insights. Graceful fallback if no API key — redirects user to Example Queries. Depends on TKT-B, TKT-C, and TKT-E.

florentino_gate.reason: P1 premium AI feature. Natural language to SQL with Andy Flower cricket insights is the headline differentiator. User-supplied API key means zero cost to us. LLM usage approved — client-side only, no server dependency. Graceful fallback ensures feature works without API key.
